mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon ( name, num, price, condition, deadline, item_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{num}, #{price}, #{condition}, #{deadline}, #{itemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET name = IFNULL( #{name}, name ), num = IFNULL( #{num}, num ), price = IFNULL( #{price}, price ), usage1 = IFNULL( #{usage1}, usage1 ), condition = IFNULL( #{condition}, condition ), deadline = IFNULL( #{deadline}, deadline ), item_id = IFNULL( #{itemId}, item_id ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId}
